entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned by Hagrid and Hermione.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is helping Harry find the Weasleys.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: Harry's friends' family, whom he is trying to find.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who was mentioned by Harry as a reason for not writing back to Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is standing at the top of the steps to Gringotts.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: A wizarding bank where Hermione is standing.

relationships.description: Hagrid is helping Harry find the Weasleys.
Harry has a connection to Dobby, as mentioned by Hagrid.
Hagrid is associated with Gringotts, as he knows someone who works there.
Hermione is standing at the top of the steps to Gringotts.
